name: Fate's Hand Jam Edition
description:
Text based adventure game with a tarot card theme and spooky feels. 

Made in 48 hrs for Chip n Jam. 

The theme is "deck", which we decided to incorporate as a deck of tarot cards. We also used the "online" modifier by developing the game to be playable in-browser, and the "retro" modifier inspired our zombies-ate-my-neighbors choice for art style. 

The Jam version has some inaccessible scenes and some bugs! We ran out of time, as seems to happen in a 48 hour jam.  I'll probably be releasing  a "polished" version after with things straightened out so you can get the rest of the story.  :) 

Hopefully will also be able to upload a HTML5 version of the game for those without flash... if java will play nicely with Stencyl.

UPDATE: Polished-up-post-jam HTML5 version here: https://esmorc.itch.io/fates-hand
